bacen API¶

bacen.get(number: int, start: str, end: str) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Gets data from Bacen Time Series Management System API

Parameters

  • number – str - Series number on Bacen SGS

  • start – str - Initial date for the series - DD/MM/YYY

  • end – str - Final date for the series - DD/MM/YYY

Returns

pandas.DataFrame
